@zmajcekBo:
You are right. I downloaded them but they were just gibberish ... probably a fail attempt from Chinese or Japanese to English using an engine translator ... Still hopping someone knowledgeable in those languages will bring a solution for us :-)

@luis17se
I wouldn't say that. For I downloaded those (now deleted) English subs, and compared them with then added (13.Assassins.2010.m-720p.Bluray.AC3.x264-EliteCoder), they have the same (seemingly quite good, reasonable) text and timemarks -- that work and cover approximately 90% of this long cut (watched it just yesterday). So that some 10% are left untranslated. A big of a deal, but then not that big of a deal maybe (with this film in particular I mean).

@zmajcekBo:
We were talking about different files obviously. I downloaded the subtitles you mention, a good solution for the time being, thanks.

It is a big deal!

There is no complete subtitle available as of yet,all the available subs are missing about 18 MINUTES.

Many key scenes  are completely lacking any translation and important parts of the story will be missed.
@mufuti9 Let's consider it fortunate, the film is over-dialoged.

This seems a really great movie, hopefully the subtitles will come along soon. 

I would recommend meanwhile Ichi the Killer, another movie of the director of 13 Assassins (Takashi Miike).
